summary: I just realised most of the decent northern lords must have died on the battlefield in the fight for Winterfell. The snakes...
body:
I just realised most of the decent northern lords must have died on the battlefield in the fight for Winterfell. The snakes Jon’s left with now - with the exception of Lyanna Mormont - are the disloyal cowards who stayed home.

This explains a lot.

reblog.comment:

tags: and y'all thought people of westeros were going to kiss her ass
summary: That makes Jon, whose real name is Aegon, the true heir to the throne — and Dany's nephew! When they discover the truth, "she...
body:
That makes Jon, whose real name is Aegon, the true heir to the throne — and Dany’s nephew! When they discover the truth, “she ends up in an incredibly fragile place,” Clarke says. “Jon is her only safety left.”

l love this song !!! and j0nerys really think that jon’s going to choose her over his people hahahha let me laugh for a minute wait till she learns that he played her all along…it gone be juicy

summary: Sansa always wanted to be a queen, but not for the reasons you think, she never desired power, just for the sake of having...
body: Sansa always wanted to be a queen, but not for the reasons you think, she never desired power, just for the sake of having power. She wanted to be a queen because it was a part of the fairytale she believed in. She wanted to be one of the maidens, the princesses, the queens of the songs!!! Wanting power was never part of Sansa’s character, stop pushing Sansa-wants-power theories, they never gonna happen!!

reblog.comment: Sansa always wanted to be a queen, but not for the reasons you think, she never desired power, just for the sake of having power. She wanted to be a queen because it was a part of the fairytale she believed in. She wanted to be one of the maidens, the princesses, the queens of the songs!!! Wanting power was never part of Sansa’s character, stop pushing Sansa-wants-power theories, they never gonna happen!!

She wanted to be a queen because it was a part of the fairytale she believed in. She wanted to be one of the maidens, the princesses, the queens of the songs!!! Wanting power was never part of Sansa’s character, stop pushing Sansa-wants-power theories, they never gonna happen!!
trail.content: Sansa always wanted to be a queen, but not for the reasons you think, she never desired power, just for the sake of having power. She wanted to be a queen because it was a part of the fairytale she believed in. She wanted to be one of the maidens, the princesses, the queens of the songs!!! Wanting power was never part of Sansa’s character, stop pushing Sansa-wants-power theories, they never gonna happen!!

summary: So @heirsoflilith requested a puppy with a puppy and it also made me think of this. Lol it's only the second time I draw Jon...
body:
So @heirsoflilith requested a puppy with a puppy and it also made me think of this. Lol it’s only the second time I draw Jon Snow and without any reference it’s… Ouch lol

[ID : Jon Snow, wearing a big fur collar and his hair down, is holding Ghost, a dire wolf puppy. He looks like he doesn’t know what do to with it.]

blog.title: AO3feed-Jonrya
blog.description: An automated feed for Jon x Arya fics posted on AO3.

title: Dark Bonds
description:
by LadyBee

At times Jon was surprised at his own lack of morals. Death could destroy a great deal of things, but nothing rotted as fast as one’s soul. He was probably going mad as Bran had said. Targaryen or not, Jon wondered what would have happened if he had never found out about his true parentage. Would he still feel the same about Arya?

Words: 6888, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: A Song of Ice and Fire - George R. R. Martin
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings, Underage
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Arya Stark, Jon Snow, Gendry Waters, Brandon Stark
  • Relationships: Jon Snow/Arya Stark, Jon Snow & Arya Stark
  • Additional Tags: Cousin Incest, Incest, Family Drama, Family Secrets, Dark Jon Snow, Dark, nothing healthy here, I’m going to hell by toboggan with this one

blog.name: stray-arrows
blog.title: ☾ KING IN THE NORTH ☆
blog.description:
iss your ~problematic~ fave |  JON SNOW | CLERITH | CLOUD STRIFE | 
 JONERYS | 
MATT MURDOCK | SPACE |  karedevil | kastle | mattelektra | ben poindexter | RICK GRIMES | richonne | CARYL | ichiruki | sasusaku | GAME OF THRONES | aliens | synthwave | the walking dead (1-6) ♥

summary: jon and tormund in SN7E6 jon: tormund: tormund, one of those so called “stubborn” “savage” wildings the northern lords hate so...
body:
jon and tormund in SN7E6

jon:

tormund:

tormund, one of those so called “stubborn” “savage” wildings the northern lords hate so much, is telling jon to not let his pride get in the way and to bend the knee to dany if dany is a good ruler (which she is).

i just find it really significant that a freefolk can understand bending the knee to the dragon queen because she’s not just a great ally against the night king but also a good ruler, but the northern fools refuse to see that. 

this scene is also significant because it proves how ridiculous the whole pol!jon shit is. the writers put scenes like the above and THIS scene:

as a callback to jon’s own wise words to mance rayder

so the fact that ANYONE claims that jon is only faking to bend the knee or that it “came out of nowhere” are being  disingenuous abut jon’s entire story. and i have yet to see any pol!jon believers acknowledge or explain these callbacks to one of jon’s most important scenes in the show. the only reasons for these callbacks is because it’s leading up/explaining why jon is bending the knee to dany. there’s no proof for pol!jon and i’m tired of seeing that shit on my dash
